analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
translated: Satisfy us with the nectar of the holy Dharma, and request the Tathāgata to remain for a long time.

original: ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis dang po nyon mongs pa la la la zhig gis khyod kyis na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis dang po nyon mongs pa la la la zhig gis khyod kyis na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na /
translated: Just as someone who is suffering in the king’s prison, when asked by someone, “What kind of pain are you experiencing?”

original: des de la smras pa /
analyzed: des de la smras pa /
translated: says to them,

original: de ni / de bzhin te /
analyzed: de ni / de bzhin te /
translated: “That’s right.

analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
translated: When I am freed from this painful feeling, then I will be in nirvāṇa,

original: bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and I will experience happiness.”

original: zhes mchi ba de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs nas /
analyzed: zhes mchi ba de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs nas /

analyzed: rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na /
translated: If you were to remain here,🔽we would be liberated from the prison of cyclic existence.

original: de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
analyzed: de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
translated: Therefore, Tathāgata, we request that you remain for a long time.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: dper gsol na /
analyzed: dper gsol na /
translated: it is like this:

original: sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni /🔽rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyis kyi /
analyzed: sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni / rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyis kyi /

original: slob ma la ni /
analyzed: slob ma la ni /

original: bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs
analyzed: bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs
translated: In the same way, O Dharma King, great physician, you who are not stingy, do not act in this way with regard to the later tantras of the Mahāyāna. Bhagavān, remain for a long time.

original: su gsol // de bzhin du shing rta la @40b shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni //
analyzed: su gsol // de bzhin du shing rta la @40b shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni //
translated: In the same way, a charioteer skilled in the science of chariots teaches the later tantras to his son,🔽but does not teach them to his students,🔽fearing that they will become his equals.

original: rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi /🔽slob ma la ni /
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi / slob ma la ni /
translated: He trains in all the analyses that are taught in the later tantras,🔽but he does not train his disciples in them.

analyzed: slob par mi bgyid pa dang / rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The same applies to the other fields of knowledge.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dper gsol na /
analyzed: dper gsol na /
translated: it is as follows:

original: byis pa'am / rgan po'am /
analyzed: byis pa'am / rgan po'am /
translated: If a child, an old person,

original: nad pa la la zhig lam bzang po las gol te lam ngan par mchis na /
analyzed: nad pa la la zhig lam bzang po las gol te lam ngan par mchis na /
translated: or a sick person strays from a good path and enters a bad path,

original: shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: they will suffer greatly.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myang bar 'gyur lags na /
translated: in the same way, sentient beings who have entered bad paths will, after separating from their bodies, experience suffering in the hells.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs so //

original: ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / tshigs u bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la'ang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro; ;de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / tshigs u bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la'ang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro; ;de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then at that time the Blessed One said to the monks,

analyzed: dge slong / khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /

translated: Then the gods, demigods, and humans, having heard the Blessed One’s wise and truthful speech, were as sorrowful as if their only child had died and been cast out in the charnel ground.

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke to them in verse:

analyzed: khyed rnams nges par bder gyur cig /
translated: “May you all be well!

original: mya ngan ma byed ma du zhig /
analyzed: mya ngan ma byed ma du zhig /
translated: Do not lament, but be patient.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi @41a *//
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi @41a *//

original: chos; ;thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis //
analyzed: chos; ;thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis //

original: bag med par ni ma gnas par //
analyzed: bag med par ni ma gnas par //
translated: Do not remain in carelessness,

original: bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis //
analyzed: bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis //
translated: but delight in conscientiousness.

analyzed: khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa'am /

analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'am /

analyzed: skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa'am /

original: 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'am /

analyzed: brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa'am /

analyzed: sems can dang sems can med pa'am / yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'am /

analyzed: bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa'am /

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'am /

original: gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am /
translated: secret or non-secret,

original: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'am /
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'am /
translated: dual or non-dual.

original: de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag la som nyi'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag la som nyi'am /
translated: Similarly, you should not have doubts,

original: yid gnyis sam /
analyzed: yid gnyis sam /

analyzed: the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang / de dag nga la zhus shig dang thams cad gcad par bya'o //

original: bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste /
translated: I will show you the supreme nectar.

original: de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: After that, I will enter parinirvāṇa.”

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
translated: it is difficult to find the appearance of a buddha.

original: mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o //
analyzed: mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to find the attainment of a human body.

analyzed: dad pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to find the perfection of faith.🔽It is very difficult to find the perfection of patience and discipline that is not broken or torn.

analyzed: bzod pa dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma ral pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'o; ;'jig rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni /
translated: In the world, it is as difficult to find the attainment of arhathood

original: gser gyi phye ma dang / au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o //
analyzed: gser gyi phye ma dang / au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o //

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

analyzed: sa ni / thams cad kyi sgo nas sems @41b can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te /

translated: Likewise, you should view my various Dharma teachings, the nectar-like food of the city of liberation, in the same way.

analyzed: sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go /
